title: We might have a problem with the Brakes... - Electric Hummer Conversion!
description: Weve got the hydraulic pump connected to the hydroboost! But there are some issues... HUGE thanks to Brian for helping out with this part of the project:  He's the guy who got me started with YouTube 8 years ago. In todays video we are working on getting the Power Steering and Power brakes set up with my Electric Hummer Conversion. The steering and brakes are both powered by one hydraulic pump that can supply 1000psi to the old hydroboost system that was previously installed in the Humvee.
